a way of feeding a baby directly with milk from a woman's breasts: A good diet is essential during breastfeeding. Breastfeeding can be difficult at first.

A breastfeeding mother feeds her baby directly with milk from her breasts. A breastfeeding baby is fed in this way: Most breastfeeding mothers can eat whatever they want without problems. The oily compounds in chillis may upset breastfeeding babies.
relating to the activity of feeding a baby directly with milk from the breasts: Linda has been a breastfeeding counsellor for 20 years. The paper analyses the breastfeeding information supplied by manufacturers of artificial infant milk.
